subject: assert and Java 1.4
msgSnippet: In Java 1.4 assert is a keyword and may not be used as an identifier, therefore my regression test code fails to build when using java 1.4. What is Junit
messageBody:
In Java 1.4 "assert" is a keyword and may not be used as an identifier,
therefore my regression test code fails to build when using java 1.4.
What is Junit going to do about it?

thanks,

mike
